Only Valve could create a cooperative puzzle game. This vastly superior sequel to 2007's Portal is pretty much everything you could hope for in a modern puzzle adventure. There is so much to do in this game: there's the single player story (including timed challenge mode), cooperative mode (also including challenge mode) and the developer commentary if you like that sort of thing. You can even create your own test chambers for either single player or co-op. On the subject of co-op, it's worthy of noting that the cooperative campaign is about as long as the main game itself, also filled with its own interesting story. While the idea of having two people solve a single test seems out of the question, Valve somehow manage to make it even more impressive than the incredible single player experience. The single player campaign alone is about three times bigger than the first game, by the way. The characters are all portrayed excellently by their respective voice artists, which includes the hilarious J.K Simmons. Even if you aren't a fan of problem-solving games, Portal 2 will find a way to make it fun for you. So do yourself a favour and download this masterpiece right now... and get ready to think with portals.

İndirimde görürseniz kaçırmayın. Çok zevkli bir oyun. Oynarken nevriniz dönecek. Yön duygunuzu alt üst ediyor.

Hikayesi o kadar güzel, coop'u o kadar zevkli ki bu oyunu hala oynamayan adam gitsin koşarak alsın. Ve indirimlerde 2 lira gibi bu oyun için gerçekten çok aşırı düşük olan bir fiyata satılması ise apayrı bir güzellik.

Hikayesinin sonunda öyle bir şey oluyor ki çok ayrı bir deneyim yaşıyorsunuz. O anı görene dek hiç böyle birşey olabileceğini düşünmezdim. Başlardaki puzzle'ları da keşke biraz zor yapasalarmış. Pat pat geçince biraz tadı kaçıyor başlangıçta insanın. Ama son 10-15 puzzle'da dakikalarca düşündüm, denedim, yanıldım, tekrar denedim. Çok güzel düşünülmüş puzzle'lar var gerçekten. Co-op'takiler de güzel fakat keşke co-op da daha bir hikaye olsa çok güzel olurdu.

Portal 2

Eines meiner Lieblingsspielen.Die Story ist einfach bombastisch und die Grafik ist auch nocht Gut.Ganz klar besser als der erste Teil ,da man mehr Elemente hat z.b DIe gelees.Ich kann es nur emphelen.Wer Spiele öfter Durchspielen will ist mit Portal 2 gut bedient.Habe das Game 5x auf Ps3 und 1x auf Pc durchgespielt,und habe dabei nie den Spielspaß verloren.Wer Portal 2 mit Kumpels zocken ist es auch kein Problem.Der Koop bietet ein witziges und langes Spielerlebnis.Im Koop benötigt man Teamarbeit das ich richtig gut finde.Koop kann man im Splitscreen oder online spielen.Wer aber noch mehr will ,wird sich im Workshop sehr freuen.Mit dem Level Editor ist es möglich seine eigene level zu bauen.Wer das aber nicht kann,kann im Workshop die Level von anderen spielen.Das Spiel läuft trotz starker Grafik auf jedem Toaster.

Wer überlegt sich das Spiel zu kaufen,kann ich nur sagen tut es,ihr werdet sehr viele Spielstunden reinstecken.Wartet am besten auf den Sale dann bekommt ihr das Spiel für c.a 2 Euro:)

I recently got back into Portal 2, so I felt it was time to post a review.

PROS
1) Chell and GLaDOS from portal 1 return in this game
2) The game has quite a few new test elements
3) The workshop has maps involving contents that was in the game, but never in any official released map. Such as the reflection gel (I've made a few maps with this, but I won't link them)
4) The gels add a unique bit of playthrough to the game. 
5) Valve released the game a day early.
6) GLaDOS has some of the funniest voice lines and does some funny things closer to the end of the game.
7) The game has some VERY interesting lore. None of which I will spoil.
8) The game has a level creator built in
9) modding tools like BEEmod and BEE2 can be used to add more elements to the level creator that were NOT in the main game.
10) you can export vmf files from the level editor using a game console command.

CONS
1) The game has very few portal momentum drop flings. This confused me, and a friend of mine, on our first playthroughs.
2) The game had a few cut elements that were intended to be in the released game.
3) The BEE2 mod can be VERY difficult to set up at times.
4) Levels made with BEEmod require you to have that mod installed on your pc to play the level. BEE2 does not need that.
5) The Excursion funnels have a glitch that can be used to get out of bounds.

In total, I'd give Portal 2 an 8/10. I can safely say it's worth buying.

Best of luck, and have a nice day!

Это одна из моих любимейших игр, хотя бы потому что она может вас расмешить, почти каждый диалог имеет элемент комичности которые смешат до слёз. У русской озвучки есть пару недостатков, это глюки(Персонажи не говорят диалог, говорят рандомные диалоги не в тему и иногда издают очень не приятный роботический визг), нехватка эмоции(Персонажи не так сильно реагируют на происходящие как в оригинальной озвучке) и упущение нескольких шуток, но скорее всего всего этого вы либо не заметите, либо встретите пару раз за игру. Оригинальная озвучка - великолепна, никаких притензии. Сюжет на первый взгляд простой, но если исследовать игру польностью можно открыть для себя совершенно другой сюжет серий Portal. Графика тут как для даты выхода игры отлична, для сегодняшних дней нормальна, главное не режет глаз. Советую её поиграть чтобы ощутить все эмоции которые испытал я.
